title: Quantifying Log4Shell: Vulnerability on a Massive Scale
description: The Log4Shell vulnerability is here to stay. There is a lot of speculation about the scope and true impact of the vulnerability: While many have labeled it ?severe,? information is limited on how widespread the risk is. In order to shed some light on the issue, Akamai Threat Labs is utilizing its visibility into numerous data centers worldwide to assess the actual risk Log4Shell poses to organizations.
author: LogFourShell
